thread.title: Hottest RPG games to add to your library

title: Hottest RPG games to add to your library
text:
Hottest RPG games to add to your library 2008-03-1 This page comes from the website NetGlobers. It has been printed on 2015-08-22 at 15:16. The original can be found here : . Travel report of Austria Cleanliness, hygiene, water quality, allergen control... Food safety Getting around, in cities or in the countryside... Is transport safe and reliable? Is public transport frequent? Are taxis easy to find? Transport Finding a safe place to stay, the cleanliness and quality of accomodation... Accomodation Being able to communicate with locals, or get in touch with people at home... And what about phones and internet access? Communication Medical facilities, emergency services, doctors, pharmacies, exotic diseases... Are the hospitals clean and well-staffed? Is it easy to find a doctor, or a pharmacy when you need them? Health care - based on 13 travel reports - by harinarayan 0 vote(s) travel resume 
Hey gamers, bored from the same old browser games that you have in your library? Well, we are going to take you through some of the hottest and most amazing new rpg games available in the market. We ensure you that these games will be interesting enough to keep you indoors long enough to go pale due to the lack of sun exposure. Now, enough with the talks and let`s see what we have on our list. 
1- Batheo 
Clapalong (publisher and developer) made sure to take you back in time to Ancient Greece in a 2D strategy game. It allows you to go in battles against Gods, heroes and giants more than just sitting around and planning for resources collection and building an army. So, basically it is filled with more action and less planning which makes it stands out among other strategy based games. Yet, you can grow and sell crops, upgrade buildings and train your troops. The game offers you 8 formations to choose from and each has its pros and cons. Now, you really need to work on raising your prestige in order to get better heroes. Did I mention that the game offers a wide variety of weaponry, horses and troops to choose from too? It is considered to be one of the best browser games. Get ready to get lost in the Greek Mythology my friends! 
2- Bleach Online 
Moving on from the Greek Mythology to the Anime type, GoGames.me brought you a 2D strategy games that will hook you up. You will get lost in the anime/mange world; you have the option of choosing between 6 characters and guess what? You can create your own “gang” and assign tasks to them. Achieving progress in the game will allow you to add more players to your team. The only negative feedback the game received was that it is automated, so you don`t have enough control over the battle as you do for assembling and choosing your team layout. 
The list of the hottest gamesnew rpg games is really long, we offered you a glimpse of what you should be expecting as new releases in the market, so stay tuned for further reviews on the rest of the list. We promise you that you won`t be leaving your house any time soon. Ah, and being harassed by your parents for being online 24/7. ...
